## CharityORG.purchaseEq() method

Purchase an equipment for a charity volunteer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
purchaseEq(memberName: string, equipName: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  memberName | string | Name ofcharity volunteer to purchase the equipment for. |
|  equipName | string | Name of Equipment to purchase. |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the equipment was successfully purchased. False otherwise

## Remarks

RAM cost: 4 GB

Attempt to purchase the specified Equipment for the specified charity volunteer.
